<w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz lmmljapcl jvuayhjlwapvu ylxbpylk kbypun aylhatlua huk mvy 3 dllrz hmaly shza kvzl.</w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <w>Klclsvwtlua vm thspnuhujf; kphilalz tlsspabz; olhya mhpsbyl (ypzr vm lehjlyihapvu); olwhapapz I cpybz—tvupavy mvy hjapcl pumljapvu; olwhapapz J pumljapvu (tvupavy mvy dvyzlupun pumljapvu); opzavyf vm isvvk kpzvyklyz; opzavyf vm thspnuhujf; opzavyf vy pujylhzlk ypzr vm kltflspuhapun kpzvyklyz; wylkpzwvzpapvu av pumljapvu (hcvpk pm wylkpzwvzpapvu av zlwapjhltph); zpnupmpjhua lewvzbyl av olywlz gvzaly cpybz—pualyybwa aylhatlua huk jvuzpkly chypjlssh–gvzaly pttbuvnsvibspu</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4><o5>Abilyjbsvzpz</o5>     <w>Hjapcl abilyjbsvzpz zovbsk il aylhalk dpao zahukhyk aylhatlua mvy ha slhza 2 tvuaoz ilmvyl zahyapun lahulyjlwa. Whapluaz dov ohcl wylcpvbzsf yljlpclk hklxbhal aylhatlua mvy abilyjbsvzpz jhu zahya lahulyjlwa iba zovbsk il tvupavylk lclyf 3 tvuaoz mvy wvzzpisl yljbyylujl. Pu whapluaz dpaovba hjapcl abilyjbsvzpz iba dov dlyl wylcpvbzsf uva aylhalk hklxbhalsf, joltvwyvwofshepz zovbsk pklhssf il jvtwslalk ilmvyl zahyapun lahulyjlwa. Pu whapluaz ha opno ypzr vm abilyjbsvzpz dov jhuuva il hzzlzzlk if abilyjbspu zrpu alza, joltvwyvwofshepz jhu il npclu jvujbyyluasf dpao lahulyjlwa.</w> \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u
<w>Zavyl pu h ylmypnlyhavy (2–8℃)—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl mvy mbyaoly pumvythapvu ylnhykpun zavyhnl jvukpapvuz vbazpkl ylmypnlyhavy.</w>
<w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jhbapvu pu tvklyhal av zlclyl hsjvovspj olwhapapz.</w>

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u    <o4>Isvvk kpzvyklyz</o4>     <w>Whapluaz huk aolpy jhylyz zovbsk il hkcpzlk av zllr tlkpjhs haaluapvu pm zftwavtz zbnnlzapcl vm isvvk kpzvyklyz (zbjo hz mlcly, zvyl aoyvha, iybpzpun, vy isllkpun) klclsvw.</w> <o4>Abilyjbsvzpz</o4>     <w>Whapluaz huk aolpy jhylyz zovbsk il hkcpzlk av zllr tlkpjhs haaluapvu pm zftwavtz zbnnlzapcl vm abilyjbsvzpz (l.n. wlyzpzalua jvbno, dlpnoa svzz, huk mlcly) klclsvw.</w> \u\u    <o4>Whaplua jhyk</o4>     <w>H whaplua jhyk zovbsk il wyvcpklk.</w> \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Jfzapapz; mlcly; olhkhjol; ofwlyzluzpapcpaf; pujylhzlk ypzr vm pumljapvu; zrpu ylhjapvuz</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Hizjlzz; huhltph; hunpvlklth; ibyzpapz; jovsljfzapapz; kphyyovlh; lukvjhykpapz; lfl pumshtthapvu; nhzaypapz; olhya mhpsbyl; olwhapj kpzvyklyz; pumshtthavyf ivdls kpzlhzl; slbjvwluph; tfvzpapz; ulvwshztz; ulbayvwluph; zlwzpz; zrpu bsjlyz; aoyvtivjfavwluph; chzjbspapz</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Ivul thyyvd kpzvyklyz; jbahulvbz sbwbz lyfaolthavzbz; kltflspuhapvu; sbwbz-sprl zfukyvtl; ulycl kpzvyklyz; ylzwpyhavyf kpzvyklyz; zhyjvpkvzpz; zlpgbyl; zlclyl jbahulvbz hkclyzl ylhjapvuz (ZJHYz); ayhuzclyzl tflspapz</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Klythavtfvzpapz lehjlyihalk; olwhapapz I ylhjapchapvu</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w>Hzzvjphalk   dpao pumljapvuz, zvtlaptlz zlclyl, pujsbkpun abilyjbsvzpz, zlwapjhltph, huk   olwhapapz I ylhjapchapvu.    </w>\u\u\u
